title: Major improvements to SQL Warehouse to improve performance, error recovery and reliability.  These enhancements **require a manual update step**
Execute will now prevent password-based logins (login screen, APIs and OData) for environments which use Windows single-signon or Okta/OIDC.

This update includes possible breaking changes for users of Execute's Data Warehousing feature (AzureSQL, Snowflake and DataHub), and environments using Single Sign-on (Windows/OKTA/OIDC).  Please carefully review the release notes for this version prior to upgrading!
